articles.title: Spacecraft enters the Sun's corona for the first time in history - Nanowerk
articles.description: A spacecraft launched by NASA has done what was once thought impossible. On April 28, the Parker Solar Probe successfully entered the corona of the Sun - an extreme environment that's roughly 1.1 million degrees C.
articles.content:
Nanowerk Newsletter
Get our Space Exploration news updates to your inbox!

articles.title: DC attorney general sues Proud Boys and Oath Keepers members to recoup costs related to January 6 - CNN
articles.description: More than two dozen members of the Proud Boys and Oath Keepers are being sued by District of Columbia Attorney General Karl Racine in an effort to recover the millions of dollars the city spent to defend the US Capitol during the January 6 attack.

articles.description: Mars' water could be trapped in clay minerals known as smectite that sit 18 miles below the Martian surface. The mineral is found on Earth and form when rock and water interact.
